trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The Pelupelu peddler has no clue how to navigate Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the customers in the Resplendent Quarter.
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Pelupelu peddler in Bayside Bevy.
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_001<tab>Oooh, I'm in a pickle. Can't exactly deliver the order if I'm lost, now can I? Curse these twisting streets!

TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_002<tab>You there, with your decidedly unflappable composure! You know your way around these streets, yes? Could you pay a visit to my customers and let them know I've brought their orders?
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_003<tab>Brilliant! Now, you'll be looking for two different houses in the Resplendent Quarter.
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_004<tab>The first has deep blue and yellow walls, with feather decorations that hang from the eaves. The man who lives there is a very eloquent Hanuhanu.
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_005<tab>The second is home to a rather voracious Moblin. You're looking for sky blue walls with a yellow roof, a storehouse, and decorative vases out front.

TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_006<tab>Remember, the Hanuhanu's house has deep blue and yellow walls, and the Moblin's house has sky blue walls with a yellow roof. Just let them know I'm here, will you?

TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_HANUHANU05023_000_010<tab>Dear me, you mean to say my package has arrived? I had some dried reeds imported from Ok'hanu, you see. Ordered them as soon as I heard the crops had recovered.

TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_HANUHANU05023_000_011<tab>Though I may live in Tuliyollal now, I always keep my homeland close to heart. To a Hanuhanu like myself, there is no greater comfort than the smell of reeds when I walk through the door.
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_HANUHANU05023_000_012<tab>Speaking of which, I had better go fetch them, hadn't I? There are a few areas that could do with a bit of touching up...
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_MOBLIN05023_000_013<tab>Ah, special order of moldflour is here at last! Now I have all the ingredients to craftybake loaves of rot-bread!

TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_MOBLIN05023_000_014<tab>Haven't heard of moldflour? Mixyblend of wheat and mycotoxins with a sweet stinksmell! In Earthenshire, all breads and cookies are craftybaked with it. Essential element of traditional Mobbie cuisine!

TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_MOBLIN05023_000_015<tab>Since stingy shopkeepers of Tuliyollal refuse to stock it, my only option was to bulkbuy with a Pelupelu goodsbearer. Now to go and bringback my package! Manythanks to kind lowlander!
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_020<tab>I see you managed to find them! Thanks to you, the packages have safely reached my customers' hands...er, paws? Claws?

TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_021<tab>In the meantime, I've been browsing Bayside Bevy. The shops here have all the most common daily necessities, along with a variety of goods from other far-flung corners of Tural.

TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_022<tab>But Tuliyollal is a melting pot of cultures with their own unique needs, and sometimes the limited selection here doesn't cut it. That's where <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> come in!
TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_023<tab>As peddlers, we travel to those distant locales, buy their most sought-after goods, and deliver them to the residents here─for a price, mind.

TEXT_KINGZA007_05023_PERUPERU05023_000_024<tab>Speaking of travel, did you come here from Eorzea, by chance? I've yet to venture out there for import goods, but one of these days I might just have to make the trip. Oh, and before I forget: your fee!
